photosynthesis.description: How plants make their own food using sunlight, water, and air

scenes.title: Meet the Plant Friend
scenes.description: A friendly leaf character greets a curious child in a sunny garden
scenes.dialogue: Hi there! I'm going to show you how plants eat!

scenes.title: Sunshine Power
scenes.description: Bright sun rays shine down on happy plants
scenes.dialogue: Plants love the sun! It gives them energy!

scenes.title: Drinking Water
scenes.description: Water droplets travel up from roots to leaves
scenes.dialogue: Slurp! Plants drink water through their roots!

scenes.title: Breathing Air
scenes.description: Tiny doors on leaves open to let air in
scenes.dialogue: Leaves have tiny doors that let air in!

scenes.title: Making Food
scenes.description: Inside the leaf, everything mixes together with magic sparkles
scenes.dialogue: Mix it all together - the plant makes its own food!

scenes.title: Sharing Oxygen
scenes.description: Fresh oxygen bubbles float out of the leaf into the air
scenes.dialogue: And it shares fresh air with us! Thank you, plants!

scenes.title: The Green Mystery
scenes.description: A science guide shows a curious student why leaves are green
scenes.dialogue: Ever wonder why leaves are green? Let me show you chlorophyll!

scenes.title: Capturing Sunlight
scenes.description: Chlorophyll molecules absorbing light energy
scenes.dialogue: Chlorophyll is like a solar panel - it catches sunlight!

scenes.title: The Ingredient Gathering
scenes.description: Water from roots and CO2 from air arriving at the leaf
scenes.dialogue: Water travels up while carbon dioxide comes in through tiny pores!

scenes.title: The Chemical Kitchen
scenes.description: Inside the chloroplast, the ingredients combine
scenes.dialogue: Inside the chloroplast, a chemical reaction happens!

scenes.title: Sugar Creation
scenes.description: Glucose molecules forming from the reaction
scenes.dialogue: Glucose is made - that's the plant's food and energy storage!

scenes.title: Oxygen Release
scenes.description: O2 molecules released as a byproduct, animals breathing it
scenes.dialogue: And oxygen is released - which all animals need to breathe!

scenes.title: Inside the Chloroplast
scenes.description: Detailed view of chloroplast structure with thylakoids
scenes.dialogue: Welcome to the chloroplast - the photosynthesis factory!

scenes.title: Light Reactions Begin
scenes.description: Light hitting photosystems and exciting electrons
scenes.dialogue: Light energy excites electrons in the thylakoid membrane!

scenes.title: Water Splitting
scenes.description: Water molecules being split to release electrons and oxygen
scenes.dialogue: Water is split: electrons power the chain, oxygen is released!

scenes.title: ATP Production
scenes.description: ATP synthase creating ATP molecules
scenes.dialogue: The energy creates ATP - the cell's energy currency!

scenes.title: Calvin Cycle
scenes.description: CO2 being fixed into organic compounds in the stroma
scenes.dialogue: In the Calvin Cycle, CO2 becomes sugar using ATP and NADPH!

scenes.title: The Complete Picture
scenes.description: Overview showing both stages working together
scenes.dialogue: Together, these reactions turn sunlight into food energy!

solar-system.description: Our cosmic neighborhood and the planets that orbit the Sun

scenes.title: Our Space Neighborhood
scenes.description: A space explorer introduces the solar system to a child
scenes.dialogue: Welcome aboard! Let's explore our space neighborhood!

scenes.title: The Mighty Sun
scenes.description: The Sun at the center, glowing bright and warm
scenes.dialogue: The Sun is a giant ball of fire - it gives us light and warmth!

scenes.title: Planet Parade
scenes.description: Planets orbiting around the Sun in their paths
scenes.dialogue: Eight planets circle around the Sun - like a cosmic dance!

scenes.title: Our Home Earth
scenes.description: Earth highlighted as our beautiful blue planet
scenes.dialogue: Earth is our home - the blue planet where we live!

scenes.title: Moon Friend
scenes.description: The Moon orbiting Earth, showing phases
scenes.dialogue: The Moon is Earth's best friend - it follows us everywhere!

scenes.title: Space Exploration
scenes.description: Looking out at the vast universe beyond
scenes.dialogue: There's so much more to discover out there!

scenes.title: The Force of Gravity
scenes.description: Demonstrating how gravity keeps planets orbiting the Sun
scenes.dialogue: Gravity is the invisible force that keeps everything in place!

scenes.title: Rocky Inner Planets
scenes.description: Mercury, Venus, Earth, and Mars shown as rocky worlds
scenes.dialogue: The inner planets are small and rocky - including Earth!

scenes.title: The Asteroid Belt
scenes.description: Thousands of rocks floating between Mars and Jupiter
scenes.dialogue: Between Mars and Jupiter, thousands of space rocks orbit!

scenes.title: Gas Giants
scenes.description: Jupiter and Saturn as massive gas planets
scenes.dialogue: Jupiter and Saturn are huge gas giants with no solid surface!

scenes.title: Ice Giants
scenes.description: Uranus and Neptune in the outer reaches
scenes.dialogue: Uranus and Neptune are ice giants - super cold and far away!

scenes.title: Comets and Beyond
scenes.description: A comet with its tail, pointing to the Kuiper Belt
scenes.dialogue: Comets are icy visitors from the edge of our solar system!

scenes.title: Solar System Formation
scenes.description: A nebula collapsing to form our solar system
scenes.dialogue: 4.6 billion years ago, a cloud of gas and dust began to collapse...

scenes.title: The Sun's Domain
scenes.description: Scale showing astronomical units and distances
scenes.dialogue: The solar system is huge - measured in Astronomical Units!

scenes.title: Terrestrial Worlds
scenes.description: Comparing the four rocky planets' characteristics
scenes.dialogue: Each rocky planet has unique features and conditions.

scenes.title: Jovian Giants
scenes.description: Detailed look at gas and ice giant composition
scenes.dialogue: Gas giants have layers of gas, liquid, and maybe a rocky core.

scenes.title: The Outer Reaches
scenes.description: Kuiper Belt, dwarf planets, and the heliosphere
scenes.dialogue: Beyond Neptune lies the Kuiper Belt and dwarf planets like Pluto.

scenes.title: Exoplanets and Beyond
scenes.description: Looking at planets around other stars
scenes.dialogue: We've found thousands of planets around other stars!

water-cycle.description: How water moves around Earth in a continuous cycle

scenes.title: A Rainy Day
scenes.description: Child and guide watching rain fall from clouds
scenes.dialogue: Look at all that rain! Where does it come from?

scenes.title: Puddle Magic
scenes.description: Sun shining on a puddle, water rising up
scenes.dialogue: Watch the puddle - the sun makes water float up into the sky!

scenes.title: Making Clouds
scenes.description: Water vapor forming into fluffy clouds
scenes.dialogue: Up high, the water becomes clouds - like cotton candy in the sky!

scenes.title: Cloud Gets Heavy
scenes.description: Cloud filling up with water droplets
scenes.dialogue: The cloud gets fuller and fuller with water drops!

scenes.title: Rain Falls Down
scenes.description: Rain falling from clouds to water plants and fill streams
scenes.dialogue: When it's too heavy - rain! Water falls back down!

scenes.title: Round and Round
scenes.description: Complete cycle shown with arrows connecting all stages
scenes.dialogue: And then it starts all over again - round and round!

scenes.title: The Water Adventure
scenes.description: Guide introduces the water cycle concept
scenes.dialogue: Water is always on an adventure - let's follow its journey!

scenes.title: Evaporation Station
scenes.description: Heat energy turning liquid water into vapor
scenes.dialogue: Heat from the sun gives water energy to float up as vapor!

scenes.title: Rising High
scenes.description: Water vapor rising into the atmosphere
scenes.dialogue: Water vapor rises higher and higher where it's colder!

scenes.title: Condensation Creation
scenes.description: Vapor cooling and forming water droplets on dust particles
scenes.dialogue: Cold air makes vapor stick together around tiny dust particles!

scenes.title: Precipitation Types
scenes.description: Different forms: rain, snow, sleet, hail
scenes.dialogue: Precipitation can be rain, snow, sleet, or even hail!

scenes.title: Collection Complete
scenes.description: Water collecting in oceans, lakes, groundwater
scenes.dialogue: Water collects in oceans, lakes, and underground - ready to start again!

scenes.title: The Complex Cycle
scenes.description: Overview of the complete water cycle with all components
scenes.dialogue: The water cycle is more complex than you might think!

scenes.title: Plant Power
scenes.description: Transpiration from forests adding water to atmosphere
scenes.dialogue: Plants release water through transpiration - like breathing water!

scenes.title: Underground Journey
scenes.description: Water seeping into soil and aquifers
scenes.dialogue: Some water soaks deep underground into aquifers!

scenes.title: Watershed Systems
scenes.description: How watersheds collect and channel water
scenes.dialogue: Watersheds are like giant funnels collecting water!

scenes.title: Human Connections
scenes.description: How humans interact with the water cycle
scenes.dialogue: Humans affect the water cycle through cities and farms.

scenes.title: Climate Connections
scenes.description: How the water cycle affects and is affected by climate
scenes.dialogue: The water cycle and climate are deeply connected!

human-body.description: The amazing systems that keep our bodies working

scenes.title: Body Adventure
scenes.description: Guide shrinks down to explore inside the body
scenes.dialogue: Let's shrink down and explore the amazing human body!

scenes.title: The Beating Heart
scenes.description: Heart pumping blood through the body
scenes.dialogue: Your heart pumps blood all day and night - ba-bump, ba-bump!

scenes.title: Breathing Buddies
scenes.description: Lungs filling with air and releasing
scenes.dialogue: Breathe in, breathe out - your lungs bring in fresh air!

scenes.title: Brain Boss
scenes.description: Brain sending signals throughout the body
scenes.dialogue: Your brain is the boss - it tells everything what to do!

scenes.title: Bones and Muscles
scenes.description: Skeleton and muscles working together to move
scenes.dialogue: Bones hold you up and muscles help you move!

scenes.title: Team Body
scenes.description: All systems working together harmoniously
scenes.dialogue: All these parts work as a team to keep you healthy!

scenes.title: System Overview
scenes.description: Introduction to body systems concept
scenes.dialogue: Your body has different systems that work together!

scenes.title: Circulatory Highway
scenes.description: Blood vessels as roads carrying blood everywhere
scenes.dialogue: Blood travels through tubes like cars on a highway!

scenes.title: Respiratory Exchange
scenes.description: Lungs exchanging oxygen and carbon dioxide
scenes.dialogue: In your lungs, oxygen goes in and carbon dioxide comes out!

scenes.title: Digestive Journey
scenes.description: Food traveling through the digestive system
scenes.dialogue: Food takes a journey through your digestive system!

scenes.title: Nervous Network
scenes.description: Nerves sending messages throughout body
scenes.dialogue: Nerves send messages faster than the internet!

scenes.title: Systems Connected
scenes.description: How all systems depend on each other
scenes.dialogue: Every system needs the others to work properly!

scenes.title: Cellular Level
scenes.description: Zooming into the cellular level of body functions
scenes.dialogue: Let's zoom in to see how your body works at the cell level!

scenes.title: Cardiovascular Detail
scenes.description: Heart chambers and blood flow mechanics
scenes.dialogue: The heart has four chambers that pump blood precisely!

scenes.title: Cellular Respiration
scenes.description: Cells using oxygen to make energy
scenes.dialogue: Inside cells, oxygen helps create energy through respiration!

scenes.title: Immune Defense
scenes.description: White blood cells fighting pathogens
scenes.dialogue: Your immune system has soldiers that fight invaders!

scenes.title: Homeostasis Balance
scenes.description: Body maintaining stable internal conditions
scenes.dialogue: Homeostasis keeps your body in perfect balance!

scenes.title: Integrated Systems
scenes.description: Complex interactions between all systems
scenes.dialogue: Every second, trillions of interactions keep you alive!

electricity.description: The flow of electrical energy and how we use it

scenes.title: Magic Power
scenes.description: Lights turning on with the flip of a switch
scenes.dialogue: Click! Like magic, the light turns on! But how?

scenes.title: Battery Power
scenes.description: A battery powering a toy
scenes.dialogue: Batteries store electricity to power our toys!

scenes.title: The Electric Road
scenes.description: Electricity flowing through wires like a road
scenes.dialogue: Electricity travels through wires like cars on a road!

scenes.title: Complete the Circle
scenes.description: A simple circuit that needs to be complete
scenes.dialogue: Electricity needs a complete path - like a circle!

scenes.title: Stay Safe
scenes.description: Safety rules about electricity
scenes.dialogue: Electricity is helpful but we must be safe around it!

scenes.title: Electricity Everywhere
scenes.description: All the things powered by electricity in daily life
scenes.dialogue: Electricity powers so many things we use every day!

scenes.title: Electron Adventure
scenes.description: Introduction to electrons as tiny particles
scenes.dialogue: Electricity is made of tiny particles called electrons!

scenes.title: Conductor Highway
scenes.description: Electrons flowing easily through metal conductors
scenes.dialogue: Conductors like metal let electrons flow easily!

scenes.title: Insulator Walls
scenes.description: Insulators blocking electron flow
scenes.dialogue: Insulators like rubber stop electricity - they keep us safe!

scenes.title: Series Circuit
scenes.description: Components connected in a single path
scenes.dialogue: In a series circuit, electricity has only one path!

scenes.title: Parallel Circuit
scenes.description: Components with multiple paths
scenes.dialogue: Parallel circuits give electricity many paths to take!

scenes.title: Building Circuits
scenes.description: Child building a simple circuit
scenes.dialogue: Now you can build your own circuits!

scenes.title: Electric Properties
scenes.description: Introduction to voltage, current, and resistance
scenes.dialogue: Voltage, current, and resistance work together!

scenes.title: Static vs Current
scenes.description: Comparing static electricity to current electricity
scenes.dialogue: Static electricity stays put, current electricity flows!

scenes.title: Resistance Matters
scenes.description: How resistance affects current flow
scenes.dialogue: Resistance controls how much current flows!

scenes.title: Generating Power
scenes.description: How generators convert motion to electricity
scenes.dialogue: Generators use magnets and motion to make electricity!

scenes.title: Electromagnetic Connection
scenes.description: Relationship between electricity and magnetism
scenes.dialogue: Electricity and magnetism are connected - electromagnetism!

scenes.title: Power Grid
scenes.description: How electricity reaches our homes
scenes.dialogue: Electricity travels a long way from power plants to your home!

styleGuide.artStyle: Pixar-style 3D animation, bright colors, expressive characters, educational but fun
styleGuide.characterConsistency: Characters must maintain consistent appearance across all panels
styleGuide.panelFormat: Square 1:1 ratio, clear focal point, minimal text in image

promptTemplate.base: Create a Pixar-style educational comic panel illustration. Style: bright, colorful, 3D animated look with expressive characters. The scene shows {sceneDescription}. Characters present: {characterNames}. Setting: {setting}. Mood: {mood}. Educational focus: {educationalFocus}. The image should be clear, engaging, and suitable for children.
promptTemplate.characterIntegration: The main guide character ({guideName}) should be prominently featured alongside the student character ({studentName}). They should be interacting naturally and expressively.
promptTemplate.safetyNote: Ensure all content is age-appropriate, educational, and promotes curiosity and learning.
